channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon Music’s new AI feature generates personalized playlists every Monday
item.description: Amazon Music's new feature “Weekly Vibe,” generates personalized playlists every Monday that are tailored to each listener's evolving music tastes.

item.title: InDrive has big plans to become a global ‘super app’ where others have failed
item.description: InDrive plans to expand into multiple verticals over the next 12 months across its top markets, starting with grocery deliveries in Kazakhstan.

item.title: Why Former NFL All-Pros Are Turning to Psychedelics
item.description: Research into whether drugs like ayahuasca can mitigate the effects of traumatic brain injury is in its infancy. Pro athletes like Jordan Poyer are fo...

item.title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds (2nd Gen): Excellent Buds
item.description: With slight, useful changes like wireless charging and better processing, these noise-canceling buds remain at the top of the pile.

item.title: Why Your Office Chair Should Have Lumbar Support
item.description: Office chairs and gaming chairs often tout lumbar support as a must-have feature. I spoke to some experts to see if it's as essential as claimed.

item.title: Uber and Momenta to test autonomous vehicles in Germany in 2026
item.description: Momenta is one of 20 global AV partners that Uber has scooped up across its ridehail, delivery, and freight businesses. Uber says those partnerships h...

item.title: SpaceX strikes $17B deal to buy EchoStar’s spectrum for Starlink’s direct-to-phone service
item.description: Elon Musk's SpaceX has agreed to acquire 50MHz of wireless spectrum and Mobile Satellite Service spectrum licenses from EchoStar for about $17 billion...

item.title: More than 10 European startups became unicorns this year
item.description: This is a good indication of the sectors that are hot among investors, from biotech and defense tech to AI, AI, and AI.

item.title: The iPhone 17 Air Could Use a Silicon-Carbon Battery. What Is It?
item.description: Phones with thinner designs are enjoying a moment. But while thin phones usually suffer poor battery life, batteries with silicon-carbon anodes are he...

item.title: I Hate My AI Friend
